cause.description:
This causes is dedicated to destroying all factions of terrorism, through whatever means necessary, recognizing that war in our time may be necessary to avoid the growth and spread of this dangerous ideology. Why is it that the Iranian government recognizes that peace will bring stability, yet actively persue instability. Terrorism has dulled our senses. In the Palestinian question, who gets the blame for the lack of progress? The West. In Lebanon - a crisis deliberately provoked by, again, the same forces, who is held responsible? Israel. There is no alternative to fighting this menace wherever it rears its head. There are no demands that are remotely negotiable. It has to be beaten. Period.
1. Terrorism is the largest threat facing the global community
2. It must be stamped out by any means necessary
3. The proliferation of terrorism will lead to a more difficult future
